ModMetaData.name: Aliens: Fireteam Elite Armory
ModMetaData.author: JangoD'soul
ModMetaData.description:
This mod adds Armor and weapons from Aliens: Fireteam Elite
[h1]Features:[/h1] - UACM Cap - Lightweight Helmet - Enhanced Helmet - Elite Fireteam Armor - Kramer .50 Magnum - Kramer Short-Barrel - L56A3 Smartgun - L56A3 Smartgun - M10 Auto Pistol - M12_RPG_Launcher - M12A1 Rocket Launcher - M37A3_Pump_Shotgun - M39_Submachine_Gun - M41A3_Burst_Rifle - M41E4_Heavy_Pulse_Rifle - M42A3_Sniper_Rifle - M51 Breaching Scattergun - M94_Impact_Grenade - M95_Grenade_Launcher - Mark 7 Mod 2 CQB Pistol - X43 Barrage Flechette SMG - X46 Ballista Flechette
[h1]Research Prerequisite[/h1] - Apparels "Fabrication" - Weapons "Gunsmithing" [h1]recipeUsers[/h1] - Apparel "fabrication bench" - Weapons "Machining Table"
Commissioned for "@paranautic" from "Rimworld Mod Market" Discord.
[h1]Credits:[/h1] - Aliens: Fireteam Elite - JangoDsoul- Art and XML coder
[url=https://discord.com/invite/7befJWr9xS][img]https://i.imgur.com/cfoFEMA.png[/img][/url]
